SwitchPreference.android:title: Hide unwanted popups and dialogs
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable 'Check cover' popup (S5), BT/WiFi dialogs (S5/S7) and Sfinder in notifications (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Enable reader mode (Adapt display)
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Enable Samsung screen ebook reading mode for Adobe Reader and Moon+ Reader (S5)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Gentle haptic feedback
SwitchPreference.android:summary: 10 ms instead of 50 ms for touch keys

SwitchPreference.android:title: No password after boot
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Workaround for the 'Unable to use fingerprints.' message after boot

SwitchPreference.android:title: Native touch key light settings
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Re-enable the lost option to set buttons light timeout (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Basic (Screen mode) for video only
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Switch to sRGB (Basic screen mode) for video (MX Player/YouTube) while keeping Adaptive for everything else (S7 on Android 6)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Always allow MTP access
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Get rid of the 'Allow access to device data' dialog (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: MTP without unlock
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Start MTP even with screen off or without unlocking unsecure keyguard (S5/S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Detailed Battery usage
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Enable detailed 'Wi-Fi/Awake/Screen on' battery usage stats (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Keep LED off during DnD
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable 'LED indicator' (battery/notifications etc.) when Do not disturb mode is active (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: No vibrations during DnD
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable any vibrations/haptic feedback when Do not disturb mode is active (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remap BT redial to NEXT
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Remap 'redial' action on Bluetooth headset to 'next track' (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: No 2G mode
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Enable the 'LTE/3G(auto connect)' option in Network mode (S7)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Hide VoLTE icon
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable VoLTE/VoWifi icons in system status bar (S7)
